column4: SInce you went for a different kernel, what else is different from the base ubuntu install.  Any added repos in your sources list
i just switched because of the 4gb ram whcih are not recognized with other kernel
that did not answer my question
did you run any scripts that did?
no i should know if i had
sudo apt-get install pastebinit  && pastebinit /etc/apt/sources.list    (Provide Pastebin link in channel)      to be sure
sipior: i just find that the macbooks of others run way smoother overall than my ubuntu
clean like you said..  Was it slow with the standard kernel
yes actually it was slow already by then
Have you run top to see what is sucking cpu cycles
its mostly java (im using aptana ide) or firefox
that did not answer my question
well java is sucking RAM like shit and firefox too, but also cpu cycles sometimes
Are you swapping much in and out to ram
how can i figure out? system monitor says 0% swap used
type free in term to find out
